      • registerEntityRenderingHandler

        @Deprecated
public static void registerEntityRenderingHandler​(java.lang.Class<? extends net.minecraft.entity.Entity> entityClass,
                                                  net.minecraft.client.renderer.entity.Render<? extends net.minecraft.entity.Entity> renderer)
        已过时。
        use the factory version during Preinitialization. TODO Will be removed in 1.11.
        Register an entity rendering handler. This will, after mod initialization, be inserted into the main render map for entities. Call this during Initialization phase.

      • loadEntityRenderers

        public static void loadEntityRenderers​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends net.minecraft.entity.Entity>,net.minecraft.client.renderer.entity.Render<? extends net.minecraft.entity.Entity>> entityRenderMap)

      • registerEntityRenderingHandler

        public static <T extends net.minecraft.entity.Entity> void registerEntityRenderingHandler​(java.lang.Class<T> entityClass,
                                                                                          IRenderFactory<? super T> renderFactory)
        Register an entity rendering handler. This will, after mod initialization, be inserted into the main render map for entities. Call this during Preinitialization phase.

      • loadEntityRenderers
